room_title: Escape room "The Pirate Chamber" by The Secret Chambers in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: So I just did secret Chambers pirate room. We had a group of 8 ranging from 72 years old to 7 years old. It was amazing. Everyone had fun. The special effects we're great. Walls opening up, canons going off, keys and locks everywhere. We were all so excited. We got out with seconds to spare. Highly recommend.

room_title: Escape room "The Pirate Chamber" by The Secret Chambers in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We received this as a gift. We had a group of nine from ages 12 to 73 and it was a fun for everyone! Staff...exceptional. The Pirate room was just awesome. Canâ€™t wait for the next adventure.

room_title: Escape room "The Pirate Chamber" by The Secret Chambers in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: The pirate room was awesome! We had a group of ten go tonight and we made it out! The guys working there were great and the room was very well decorated! I can not wait until they get more rooms open!!

room_title: Escape room "The Pirate Chamber" by The Secret Chambers in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: The place is amazing and the staff is great! It's a fun experience! I highly recommend it!

room_title: Escape room "The Pirate Chamber" by The Secret Chambers in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: The reaction when we found the final key with just under the two minutes left on the clock was priceless! It was our first escape room experience and we couldn't have enjoyed ourselves more. I highly recommend it!
